# RDS Core Library

Package Registry https://code.roche.com/rds/core/-/packages

# Getting started

1. Set Up registry for `@rds` scope

   ```
   npm config set @rds:registry https://code.roche.com/api/v4/

   or

   //here define how to setup yarn registry
   ```

1. Install `@rds/core`

   ```
   npm install @rds/core

   or

   yarn add @rds/core
   ```
